ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine

ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine Interface Reference

This is an abstraction of a query engine. A query engine can create queries for various data manipulation tasks. Implementing classes will each provide an interface to a different datasource. More...

Inheritance diagram for ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine:
[legend]

List of all members.

abstract String addItem (String entity, Object toAdd)
abstract String updateItem (String entity, Object toUpdate, String[] idFields, String[] ids)
abstract String deleteItems (String entity, String[] idField, String[] id)

Package Functions

abstract String getItems (String[] table, String[] fields, String[] idFields, String[] ids, String[] orderBy)

Detailed Description

This is an abstraction of a query engine. A query engine can create queries for various data manipulation tasks. Implementing classes will each provide an interface to a different datasource.

An interface of a query engine.

Author:
mep

abstract String ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine.addItem ( String  entity,
Object  toAdd 
) [pure virtual]

Returns a query to add items to the database.

Parameters:
entity The entity to which to add items (typically, a database table).
toAdd The item to add.
Returns:
Query to run.

Implemented in ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine.

abstract String ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine.deleteItems ( String  entity,
String[]  idField,
String[]  id 
) [pure virtual]

Returns a query to delete one or more items from the database.

Parameters:
entity The entity from which to delete items (typically, a database table).
idField The id fields used to identify the items.
id The values of the id fields.
Returns:
Query to run.

Implemented in ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine.

abstract String ScheatorDb.AbstractQueryEngine.getItems ( String[]  table,
String[]  fields,
String[]  idFields,
String[]  ids,
String[]  orderBy 
) [package, pure virtual]

Returns a query to retrieve fields from the database.

Parameters:
table Table names.
fields Fields to retrieve. It's up to the implementation whether this is mandatory or not.
idFields Fields used to make the query. It's up to the implementation whether this is mandatory or not.
ids Values for the ifFields. Must be in same order. It's up to the implementation whether this is mandatory or not.
Returns:
Query to run.

Implemented in ScheatorDb.SqlQueryEngine.

Object  toUpdate,

String[]  ids 
) [pure virtual]

Returns a query to update values of an item in the database.

Parameters:

Returns:
